Write password for key ID {0}: Lembani mawu achinsinsi a ID ya kiyi {0}
Asks you to fill the required fields to: Akufunsani kuti mudzaze magawo omwe mukufuna kuti mutumize uthenga wobisika ku adilesi
Show progress bar while downloading or u: Onetsani kapamwamba pomwe mukutsitsa kapena kutsitsa kuchokera ku "pezani" kapena "ikani" lamulo
If true, it makes \"get\" or \"put\" sho: Ngati ndi zoona, zimapangitsa "kupeza" kapena "kuyika" kuwonetsa kapamwamba pomwe mukutsitsa kapena kutsitsa.
Please use \"ftp\" if you are going to u: Chonde gwiritsani "ftp" ngati mukufuna kukweza mafayilo ku seva ya FTP.
Write how many times the \"put\" command: Lembani kangati lamulo la "kuyika" liyeneranso kuyesanso kukweza zolephera. Iyenera kukhala yowerengeka.
The specified line number may not be lar: Nambala ya mzere yomwe yatchulidwa siyingakhale yokulirapo kuposa nambala yomaliza ya fayilo.
Activates 255 color support for Dissolve: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu wa 255 kwa Dissolve.
Activates true color support for Dissolv: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa Dissolve.
Makes a directory in the current working: Amapanga chikwatu mu chikwatu chomwe chikugwira ntchito pano
Removes a directory from the current wor: Imachotsa chikwatu kuchokera patsamba lomwe likugwira ntchito pano
This section lists all general kernel se: Gawoli limatchula zoikika zonse za kernel, makamaka posunga kernel.
This section changes hardware probe beha: Gawoli limasintha machitidwe a kafukufuku wa Hardware.
This section represents the login settin: Gawo ili likuyimira zosintha zolowera. Tulukani muakaunti yanu kuti kusinthaku kuchitike.
This section lists the network settings,: Gawoli limatchulira zosintha ma netiweki, monga chipolopolo cha FTP, zosintha zamalamulo zokhudzana ndi netiweki, ndi zoikidwiratu zakutali.
This section lists all the screensavers: Gawoli limatchula zowonera pazenera zonse ndi zosintha zawo.
Settings that don't fit in their appropr: Zikhazikiko zomwe sizikukwanira magawo awo oyenera zimakhala pano.
Tests mods by providing mod files: Amayesa ma mods powapatsa mafayilo amtundu
* Press any key to start the kernel or E: * Dinani batani lililonse kuti muyambe kernel kapena ESC kuti mutuluke.
When listing mail messages, show body pr: Mukamalemba mndandanda wamakalata, onetsani kuwonera thupi.
Activates 255 color support for Bouncing: Imayambitsa chithandizo chamtundu wa 255 cha BouncingBlock.
Activates true color support for Bouncin: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa BouncingBlock.
Queries a character in a specified line: Kufunsa khalidwe mu mzere wodalirika kapena mizere yonse
Checking for updates is disabled because: Kufufuza zosintha ndikulephera chifukwa mukugwiritsa ntchito njira yachitukuko.
Turns on or off the text editor autosave: Kuyatsa kapena kutseka mawonekedwe osintha mkonzi.
If autosave is enabled, the text file wi: Ngati autosave itathandizidwa, fayiloyo imasungidwa pamasekondi "n" aliwonse.
Amalemba macheza akutali kuti athetse zolakwika.
How many milliseconds to wait before mak: Ndi ma millisecond angati amene mungadikire musanapange kulemba kotsatira?
Lets you use an SSH FTP server: Amakulolani kugwiritsa ntchito seva ya SSH FTP
